TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RouteParameter extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter

summary.span: 将 URL 段的值绑定到参数对象。

span.span: Binds the value of a URL segment to a parameter object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你实现 ASP.NET Web 站点中的路由，则可以使用要绑定到的数据库查询或命令的请求的 url 段的值对象。If you implement ASP.NET routing in a Web site, you can use the object to bind the value of a segment of the requested URL to a database query or command. 您可以声明对象在标记中的数据源控件或控件。You can declare objects in markup for data source controls or the control. Visual Studio Web 站点项目的源代码是可随附于本主题：[下载](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=168640)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=168640). ## Examples 在本部分中的示例演示如何使用标记将 URL 参数值传递到为数据指定查询中的对象源控件。The examples in this section show how to use objects in markup to pass URL parameter values to a query that is specified for a data source control. 下面的示例显示了代码中定义名为的路由的 Global.asax 页`ProductRoute`。The following example shows code in the Global.asax page that defines a route that is named `ProductRoute`. 路由定义名为 URL 参数`productname`。The route defines a URL parameter that is named `productname`. 路由还定义了一个可选的通用参数，名为`culture`，这可用于指定在其中显示产品说明的语言。The route also defines an optional catchall parameter that is named `culture`, which can be used to specify the language in which the product description is displayed. Product.aspx 页面处理此路由的请求。The Product.aspx page handles requests for this route. 下面的示例演示 Product.aspx 页。The following example shows the Product.aspx page. 该页面包含控件具有需要两个参数，一个用于产品的名称和产品说明的语言之一的查询。The page contains a control that has a query that requires two parameters, one for the name of the product and one for the language of the product description. 对象用于提供查询参数的值。 objects are used to supply the values for the query parameters. 路由 URL 参数的值`productname`传递给查询参数`@productname`。The value of the route URL parameter `productname` is passed to the query parameter `@productname`. 路由 URL 参数的值`culture`传递给查询参数`@culture`。The value of the route URL parameter `culture` is passed to the query parameter `@culture`. 如果路由 URL 不包含 URL 参数`culture`，使用默认值为"en"。If a route URL does not include the URL parameter `culture`, a default value of "en" is used. 下面的示例显示了名为 ProductLinks.aspx，其中包含使用路由的 Url 链接到 Product.aspx 页的超链接的页面。The following example shows a page that is named ProductLinks.aspx, which contains hyperlinks that link to the Product.aspx page by using route URLs. 这些超链接使用`RouteUrl`表达式来创建路由的 Url。These hyperlinks use `RouteUrl` expressions to create route URLs. 第一个链接不包括`culture`路由参数。The first link does not include a `culture` route parameter. 因此，"en"中定义的默认值对象`@culture`将在查询中使用查询参数。Therefore, the default value of "en" that is defined in the object for `@culture` query parameter will be used in the query. 第二个链接提供了`culture`值为"fr"，会导致要以法语显示的说明。The second link provides a `culture` value of "fr", which causes the description to be displayed in French. 有关如何使用详细信息`RouteUrl`表达式，请参阅[如何： 从路由构造 Url](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1ffd4085-71f6-4822-be8f-f682ca638650)。For more information about how to use `RouteUrl` expressions, see [How to: Construct URLs from Routes](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1ffd4085-71f6-4822-be8f-f682ca638650). 单击第一个超链接时，请参阅中的以下值的 Product.aspx 页控件：When you click the first hyperlink, you see the Product.aspx page with the following values in the control: |ProductIDProductID|nameName|描述Description| |---------------|----------|-----------------| |`994`|`LL Bottom Bracket`|`Chromoly steel.`| 当您单击第二个超链接时，请参阅中的以下值控件：When you click the second hyperlink, you see the following values in the control: |ProductIDProductID|nameName|描述Description| |---------------|----------|-----------------| |`994`|`LL Bottom Bracket`|`Acier chromé.`| 若要运行此示例中，添加两个.aspx 页和代码在 Global.asax 文件中定义一个名为的连接字符串的 ASP.NET 网站或 Web 应用程序`AdventureWorksLTConnectionString`AdventureWorksLT 数据库。To run this example, add the two .aspx pages and the code in the Global.asax file to an ASP.NET Web site or Web application that defines a connection string named `AdventureWorksLTConnectionString` for the AdventureWorksLT database. 有关如何设置连接到 AdventureWorksLT 数据库的信息，请参阅[如何： 设置 AdventureWorksLT 示例数据库的 ASP.NET 开发](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2baad633-9d63-49cc-a6b2-917cafd35356)。For information about how to set up a connection to the AdventureWorksLT database, see [How to: Set Up an AdventureWorksLT Sample Database for ASP.NET Development](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2baad633-9d63-49cc-a6b2-917cafd35356). 有关 ASP.NET 路由的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 路由](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/892441af-8f1d-483e-ab5f-b82c23576f5a)。For more information about ASP.NET routing, see [ASP.NET Routing](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/892441af-8f1d-483e-ab5f-b82c23576f5a).

summary.span: 获取或设置从中检索路由参数值的路由段的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the route segment from which to retrieve the value for the route parameter.

value.span: 包含参数值的路由段的名称。

span.span: The name of the route segment that contains the value for the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在定义的路由模式时，可以包括用作 Web 请求 URL 中的实际值的占位符的段。When you define a route pattern, you can include segments that serve as placeholders for the actual values in the Web request URL. 通过将它们括在大括号中定义的占位符 (`{`和`}`)。You define placeholders by enclosing them in braces ( `{` and `}` ). 例如，格式中的路由模式`blog/{action}/{entry}`包含名为的占位符`action`和`entry`。For example, a route pattern in the format `blog/{action}/{entry}` contains placeholders named `action` and `entry`. 若要检索的占位符值，请设置属性的名称的占位符和调用方法。To retrieve the value of a placeholder, set the property to the name of the placeholder and call the method.

span.span: ASP.NET Routing
